title: How to Clean the Toilet Overnight

steps.headline: Wait until there is no likelihood of anyone using the bathroom again for that night.
steps.description: Alternatively, if you have more than one toilet, clean them on separate nights and bar use of one of the bathrooms.

steps.headline: Pour 250 ml of borax into the toilet bowl.
Leave overnight to do its miracle work.
In the morning, run the toilet brush around the bowl quickly.
steps.description: Flush. A sparkling toilet bowl should appear.

text: Wait until there is no likelihood of anyone using the bathroom again for that night. Alternatively, if you have more than one toilet, clean them on separate nights and bar use of one of the bathrooms. Pour 250 ml of borax into the toilet bowl.  Leave overnight to do its miracle work.  In the morning, run the toilet brush around the bowl quickly. Flush. A sparkling toilet bowl should appear. Finished.
